channel.title: May I please have a unban
channel.description:
I'm sorry for what I did last time. I'm more mature than I was a few months ago. I really have nothing left to say but sorry and I'll never do it again.
P.S. i never did get a second chance :o

item.title: May I please have a unban
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I think it’s been long enough.

EDIT - Staff look at the reply I made to that topic

Read full topic

item.title: May I please have a unban
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:8, topic:419067”]Staff refer to:

http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,496005.0.html

As far as I’m aware Tabbykillers ban time was never actually decided. I have no issue with him being unbanned anyhow, it has been more than enough time since he was banned.[/quote]I agree, it’s been a very long ban.

Read full topic

item.title: May I please have a unban
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:419067”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=521596.msg3790545#msg3790545 date=1319253396]
I’m sorry for what I did last time. I’m more mature than I was a few months ago. I really have nothing left to say but sorry and I’ll never do it again.

P.S. i never did get a second chance :o
[/quote]

Second chances only belong to those who deserve it.[/quote]
duh. So why doesn’t he deserve it?

Read full topic
